A4.text: Edward Furlong portrayed John Connor in Terminator 2: Judgment Day.

A5.text: Nick Stahl was given the role of John Connor in Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines.

A6.text: Furlong secured the role of young John Connor at his last audition.
